name: prime-lhaktenjing
description: These assignment has several parts: 1. Create a page that has a form with a number input field [25]    1. The page must use bootstrap (use CDN link) [5]    1. The page should have a centered image [5]    1. The form's action should be `checkprime` with method GET [5]    1. The input field should validate that the text is a number greater or equal than 2. You might get ideas from the midterm files. [10] 1. Create a node application that will respond to the form on the page [25]    1. The node program should use Express [5]    1. Node should serve the image used in the page as a static resource [5]    1. It would have a route to handle GET requests with `checkprime` resource, this request should respond if the number is prime or not. [15]    1. CHALLENGE: the node program responds the prime factors of non-prime numbers [15]
